level.heading: First source employment agreement required.
level.text: Tenant businesses chosen for occupancy in business incubators shall execute a first source employment agreement with the District government pursuant to ยง 2-219.03.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-71
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-71, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 2-1209.01.
